actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to permit Alexander Solzhenitsyn and his family to become permanent residents of the United States if Mr. Solzhenitsyn wants to immigrate to the United States.

summary.text: Permits Alexander Solzhenitsyn and his family to become permanent residents of the United States if Mr. Solzhenitsyn wants to immigrate to the United States.

titles.title: A bill to permit Alexander Solzhenitsyn and his family to become permanent residents of the United States if Mr. Solzhenitsyn wants to immigrate to the United States.
